main.name: Chih-Chin Tsai
main.description: My interest areas are web design, software engineering, and data analytics as well.
main.bio: Hi, my name is Chih-Chin (Tony) Tsai. I was born in Hsinchu, Taiwan. I’m currently seeking internship opportunities in SDE/WD/DA positions or other related positions starting July 2020.
main.bio2: I'm a graduate student at Texas A&M University majored in Computer Engineering expected graduate in Apr 2022.
main.contactmessage: Please send me emails if you have questions.

education.description: Courses: CSCE 606 Software engineering, CSCE 629 Analysis of Algorithms, CSCE 689 SPTP: SFTWR ENG FOR SCI/ENG
Courses: Database design, Object-Oriented Programming, Data Structure

work.title: Process Engineer
work.description: Developed an auto wafer dispatch system by using Python with 20+ users that shaped core features based on user behavioral patterns; increased user-task efficiency by 50%
work.description2: Collaborated with the engineering team to create a web app by Django and design a visualization feature to help users make informed and efficient decisions to improve product’s yield rate
work.description3: Used Oracle database system to store all the exposure equipment’s log information and create an analysis tool to identify the best process parameters
work.description4: Fine-tuned SEM image recognition system to auto detect potential defects on the wafers; decrease miss operation rate by 30%

projects.title: Tracking System
projects.category: Developed a tracking system for CS department staff members to record students’ profiles based on Django framework.

projects.title: RosenBrock Function Optimization
projects.category: Transformed a math source code into a Python OOD (Object Oriented Design) package and built a test suite using PyTest.

projects.title: Full Stack Facial Recognition App
projects.category: Established a web app to locate the human faces of an image link uploaded by users.

projects.title: Full Stack Emaily App
projects.category: Established a web app to send emails to recipients via react.js and node.js.

projects.title: Robofriends React.js App
projects.category: Established a web app to fetch Third Party Web Services for creating virtual robofriends.

projects.title: Simplesocial Django App
projects.category: Established a social platform web app based on Django3 and implemented it in CRUD manner. Deployed on Heroku

projects.title: Mysite Django App
projects.category: Established a web blog app based on Django3 and implemented it in CRUD manner. Deployed on Heroku

projects.title: GitHub Social App
projects.category: Created a Full Stack social platform for developers to interact with other’s GitHub profiles

testimonials.text: That Tony Tsai must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
